author: Flash88
title: They think it's all over...
review:
An imaginative set this one. Sort of looks a bit lost on its own, although the scoreboard element at the top makes it more than useful, if you haven't got the grandstand scoreboard.

Nice to build, and some nice parts. There are better lego football sets, and this probably needs to be accompanied by a few grandstands to make it look good.

Was always a pain getting the men in and out of this one - not sure what the underneath part is meant to be too. A tunnel? May have been better had the commentary box been on top of a mini grandstand (hmm, there's an idea for merging two sets!)
